ModMetaData.name: Misc. Bees'n'HoneyX 'Urban'
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** You must load Miscellaneous CORE first for this to work without errors! *** *** You must load Miscellaneous MapGenerator + MapGenerator 'Urban' first for this to work without errors! *** *** You must load Miscellaneous Bees'n'Honey first for this to work without errors! ***
Recommended LoadOrder: - Core - ... - Misc. Core - Misc. MapGenerator - Misc. MapGenerator 'Urban' - Misc. Bees'n'Honey - Misc. Bees'n'HoneyX 'Urban'
This mod adds the hollow trees to the 'urban' biomes
(Version: 0.19.1)
